title: The Mariner
provenance_text:
Frederick Edward McWilliam [1909-1992], London, England. G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, by November 1958 until March 1959 [1]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, March 1959 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 7) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent by G. David Thompson, Pittsburgh, PA.
[2]. The sculpture was accessioned on March 25, 1959.
